mod.name: The Unchained Mod
mod.credits: The Default Modbase, STSLib, Sounds by: Kinaticc & Plusma
mod.description: A new Character with 75+ new cards, 10 new Relics, 3 new Potions and 4 distinct archetypes you can play around with and have a lot of fun!

cards.name: Swirl
cards.description:
Retain. Gain 2 Block.
Deal 2 damage. Double the base damage and Block of ALL Swirls this turn. Exhaust.

cards.name: Swirl+
cards.description:
Retain. Gain 2 Block.
Deal 2 damage. Double the base damage and Block of ALL Swirls this turn. Gain 1 theunchainedmod:Momentum. Exhaust.

cards.name: Defend
cards.description: Gain 5 Block.

cards.name: Defend+
cards.description: Gain 8 Block.

cards.name: Defensive Link
cards.description: Gain 9 Block. Reduce the cost of a card by 1 this turn.

cards.name: Defensive Link+
cards.description: Gain 13 Block. Reduce the cost of a card by 1 this turn.

cards.name: Strike
cards.description: Deal 6 damage.

cards.name: Strike+
cards.description: Deal 9 damage.

cards.name: Whiplash
cards.description:
Deal 4 damage.
1 theunchainedmod:Chain: Enemy loses 8 HP.

cards.name: Whiplash+
cards.description:
Deal 4 damage.
1 theunchainedmod:Chain: Enemy loses 8 HP.

cards.name: Arcane Strike
cards.description: Deal 3 damage 2 times. Gain 6 theunchainedmod:Relay.

cards.name: Arcane Strike+
cards.description: Deal 5 damage 2 times. Gain 8 theunchainedmod:Relay.

cards.name: Cocoon
cards.description: Gain 8 theunchainedmod:Relay. Your theunchainedmod:Relay does not wear off at the start of next turn.

cards.name: Cocoon+
cards.description: Gain 11 theunchainedmod:Relay. Your theunchainedmod:Relay does not wear off at the start of next turn.

cards.name: Double Down
cards.description:
Gain 4 Block twice.
Counts as a card for any theunchainedmod:Chain.

cards.name: Double Down+
cards.description:
Gain 6 Block twice.
Counts as a card for any theunchainedmod:Chain.

cards.name: Dual Barrier
cards.description: Gain 3 Block. Gain 8 theunchainedmod:Relay.

cards.name: Dual Barrier+
cards.description: Gain 5 Block. Gain 10 theunchainedmod:Relay.

cards.name: Glyph Swing
cards.description: Deal 6 damage. Remove up to 8 theunchainedmod:Relayed_Damage and deal damage equal to the amount you removed.

cards.name: Glyph Swing+
cards.description: Deal 8 damage. Remove up to 12 theunchainedmod:Relayed_Damage and deal damage equal to the amount you removed.

cards.name: Grasp Future
cards.description: Deal 9 damage. Put 1 card from your draw pile on top of your draw pile.

cards.name: Grasp Future+
cards.description: Deal 12 damage. Put 1 card from your draw pile on top of your draw pile.

cards.name: Heavy Hitter
cards.description: Gain 3 temporary Strength. Whenever you hit an enemy this turn, apply 2 theunchainedmod:Crushed_Armor.

cards.name: Heavy Hitter+
cards.description: Gain 5 temporary Strength. Whenever you hit an enemy this turn, apply 3 theunchainedmod:Crushed_Armor.

cards.name: Keep Distance
cards.description: Gain 9 Block. Enemy gains 9 Block.

cards.name: Keep Distance+
cards.description: Gain 12 Block. Enemy gains 9 Block.

cards.name: Lash Out
cards.description:
Deal 13 damage.
1 theunchainedmod:Chain: Gain [E].

cards.name: Lash Out+
cards.description:
Deal 17 damage.
1 theunchainedmod:Chain: Gain [E].

cards.name: Liberation
cards.description:
Gain 7 Block.
Finish ALL your active theunchainedmod:Chains.
Remove ALL theunchainedmod:Relayed_Damage. Exhaust.

cards.name: Liberation+
cards.description:
Gain 10 Block.
Finish ALL your active theunchainedmod:Chains.
Remove ALL theunchainedmod:Relayed_Damage. Exhaust.

cards.name: Offhanded Swing
cards.description:
Deal 7 damage.
Draw 1 card, if it is a 2-cost card play it on the same enemy if possible.

cards.name: Offhanded Swing+
cards.description:
Deal 10 damage.
Draw 1 card, if it is a 2-cost card play it on the same enemy if possible.

cards.name: Prophetic Swing
cards.description:
Deal 10 damage to a random enemy.
Scry 3.

cards.name: Prophetic Swing+
cards.description:
Deal 13 damage to a random enemy.
Scry 4.

cards.name: Reckless Swing
cards.description: Deal 8 damage. Gain 8 theunchainedmod:Relayed_Damage.

cards.name: Reckless Swing+
cards.description: Deal 11 damage. Gain 8 theunchainedmod:Relayed_Damage.

cards.name: Riposte
cards.description:
Gain 5 Block. Deal 5 damage.
Gain 1 theunchainedmod:Momentum.

cards.name: Riposte+
cards.description:
Gain 7 Block. Deal 7 damage.
Gain 2 theunchainedmod:Momentum.

cards.name: Single Out
cards.description:
Deal 12 damage.
A random enemy gains 3 Block.

cards.name: Single Out+
cards.description:
Deal 16 damage.
A random enemy gains 4 Block.

cards.name: Step Back
cards.description:
Draw 1 card.
1 theunchainedmod:Chain: Gain 9 Block.

cards.name: Step Back+
cards.description:
Draw 2 cards.
1 theunchainedmod:Chain: Gain 9 Block.

cards.name: Wide Swing
cards.description:
Deal 7 damage to ALL enemies.
If you have an active theunchainedmod:Chain end your turn.

cards.name: Wide Swing+
cards.description:
Deal 10 damage to ALL enemies.
If you have an active theunchainedmod:Chain end your turn.

cards.name: À Plomb
cards.description:
Gain 6 Block. Gain 1 theunchainedmod:Momentum.
Next Turn, gain 1 theunchainedmod:Momentum.

cards.name: À Plomb+
cards.description:
Gain 9 Block. Gain 1 theunchainedmod:Momentum.
Next Turn, gain 1 theunchainedmod:Momentum.

cards.name: Arcane Transmutation
cards.description: Whenever an enemy gains Block, gain 4 theunchainedmod:Relay.

cards.name: Arcane Transmutation+
cards.description: Whenever an enemy gains Block, gain 5 theunchainedmod:Relay.

cards.name: Baguazhang
cards.description:
Gain 5 Block.
Enemy gains 5 Block.
If the enemy intends to do less than 10 damage (per hit), gain 10 Block.

cards.name: Baguazhang+
cards.description:
Gain 5 Block.
Enemy gains 5 Block.
If the enemy intends to do less than 10 damage (per hit), gain 15 Block.

cards.name: Ballet
cards.description:
At the start of your turn, gain 1 theunchainedmod:Momentum.
Swirls now hit ALL enemies.

cards.name: Ballet+
cards.description:
At the start of your turn, gain 2 theunchainedmod:Momentum.
Swirls now hit ALL enemies.

cards.name: Battement
cards.description: Deal 14 damage. Gain 2 theunchainedmod:Momentum.

cards.name: Battement+
cards.description: Deal 18 damage. Gain 3 theunchainedmod:Momentum.

cards.name: Burnish
cards.description: Exhaust a card. Gain theunchainedmod:Momentum equal to double its cost.

cards.name: Burnish+
cards.description: Exhaust a card. Gain theunchainedmod:Momentum equal to double its cost.

cards.name: Ceasefire
cards.description:
Double your theunchainedmod:Relay. Double the Block of ALL enemies.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Ceasefire+
cards.description: Double your theunchainedmod:Relay. Double the Block of ALL enemies.

cards.name: Claustrophobia
cards.description: At the start of your turn, apply 2 theunchainedmod:Crushed_Armor to ALL enemies.

cards.name: Claustrophobia+
cards.description:
Innate.
At the start of your turn, apply 2 theunchainedmod:Crushed_Armor to ALL enemies.

cards.name: Cripple
cards.description: Apply 4 theunchainedmod:Crushed_Armor. Apply 2 Weak. Apply 2 Vulnerable. Exhaust.

cards.name: Cripple+
cards.description: Apply 6 theunchainedmod:Crushed_Armor. Apply 3 Weak. Apply 3 Vulnerable. Exhaust.

cards.name: Cruiserweight
cards.description: Whenever you draw a 2-cost card, draw 1 card.

cards.name: Cruiserweight+
cards.description: Whenever you draw a 2-cost card, draw 2 cards.

cards.name: Cuff
cards.description:
Innate.
Deal 3 damage.
Apply 1 Weak.
2 theunchainedmod:Chain: Enemy loses 3 Strength.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Cuff+
cards.description:
Innate.
Deal 3 damage.
Apply 2 Weak.
2 theunchainedmod:Chain: Enemy loses 4 Strength.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Eye For An Eye
cards.description:
Gain 5 Vigor.
Remove up to 10 theunchainedmod:Relayed_Damage.
Gain Vigor equal to the amount you removed.

cards.name: Eye For An Eye+
cards.description:
Gain 5 Vigor.
Remove up to 15 theunchainedmod:Relayed_Damage.
Gain Vigor equal to the amount you removed.

cards.name: Fractal Shield
cards.description: Gain 9 theunchainedmod:Relay. theunchainedmod:Relay now blocks theunchainedmod:Relayed_Damage.

cards.name: Fractal Shield+
cards.description:
Innate.
Gain 9 theunchainedmod:Relay. theunchainedmod:Relay now blocks theunchainedmod:Relayed_Damage.

cards.name: Full Swing
cards.description: Deal 5 damage. Deal 5 damage to ALL enemies.

cards.name: Full Swing+
cards.description: Deal 7 damage. Deal 7 damage to ALL enemies.

cards.name: Guarded Posture
cards.description: Whenever you finish a Chain, gain 3 Block.

cards.name: Guarded Posture+
cards.description: Whenever you finish a Chain, gain 4 Block.

cards.name: Heartfelt Speech
cards.description:
Gain 2 Vulnerable.
2 theunchainedmod:Chain: Gain 1 Intangible. Exhaust.

cards.name: Heartfelt Speech+
cards.description:
Gain 2 Vulnerable.
1 theunchainedmod:Chain: Gain 1 Intangible. Exhaust.

cards.name: Immovable Object
cards.description: Gain 11 Block. Whenever you are attacked this turn, the attacking enemy gains 4 theunchainedmod:Crushed_Armor.

cards.name: Immovable Object+
cards.description: Gain 13 Block. Whenever you are attacked this turn, the attacking enemy gains 5 theunchainedmod:Crushed_Armor.

cards.name: Keep Swinging
cards.description: All Cards with "Swing" in their name deal 4 additional damage.

cards.name: Keep Swinging+
cards.description: All Cards with "Swing" in their name deal 6 additional damage.

cards.name: Masterwork Glyph
cards.description: Gain 9 theunchainedmod:Relay. If you do not have Block, gain 9 theunchainedmod:Relay again.

cards.name: Masterwork Glyph+
cards.description: Gain 11 theunchainedmod:Relay. If you do not have Block, gain 11 theunchainedmod:Relay again.

cards.name: Overexertion
cards.description:
Gain [E] [E].
Gain 14 theunchainedmod:Relayed_Damage.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Overexertion+
cards.description:
Gain [E] [E] [E].
Gain 14 theunchainedmod:Relayed_Damage.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Premonition
cards.description:
Gain 6 Block.
If you have spent ALL your [E] at the end of this turn, gain [E] [E] next turn.

cards.name: Premonition+
cards.description:
Gain 8 Block.
If you have spent ALL your [E] at the end of this turn, gain
[E] [E] [E] next turn.

cards.name: Prophecy
cards.description:
Copy a card and put the copy on top of your draw pile.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Prophecy+
cards.description:
Copy a card twice and put both copies on top of your draw pile.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Quick Swing
cards.description:
Deal 8 damage.
1 theunchainedmod:Chain: Draw 2 cards.

cards.name: Quick Swing+
cards.description:
Deal 10 damage.
1 theunchainedmod:Chain: Draw 3 cards.

cards.name: Razor Chain
cards.description:
Enemy loses 10 HP.
HP loss is affected by theunchainedmod:Damage_Modifiers.

cards.name: Razor Chain+
cards.description:
Enemy loses 15 HP.
HP loss is affected by theunchainedmod:Damage_Modifiers.

cards.name: Refresh
cards.description:
Gain 14 theunchainedmod:Relay.
Lose up to 14 theunchainedmod:Relayed_Damage and gain Block equal to the amount you removed.

cards.name: Refresh+
cards.description:
Gain 18 theunchainedmod:Relay.
Lose up to 18 theunchainedmod:Relayed_Damage and gain Block equal to the amount you removed.

cards.name: Reinforced Link
cards.description: Gain 4 Block. If you have an active theunchainedmod:Chain, gain [E] and draw 1 card.

cards.name: Reinforced Link+
cards.description: Gain 6 Block. If you have an active theunchainedmod:Chain, gain [E] and draw 1 card.

cards.name: Royal Assessment
cards.description: Gain [E] for every enemy that is blocking.

cards.name: Royal Assessment+
cards.description: Gain [E] if ALL enemies are blocking and [E] for every enemy that is blocking.

cards.name: Royal Decree
cards.description:
Add a random 2-cost card into your hand.
It costs 0 this turn
and exhausts.

cards.name: Royal Decree+
cards.description:
Add a random 2-cost card into your hand.
It costs 0 this turn
and exhausts.

cards.name: Share Pain
cards.description:
Deal 0 damage.
Damage is equal to ALL theunchainedmod:Relayed_Damage you have gained this combat.

cards.name: Share Pain+
cards.description:
Retain.
Deal 0 damage.
Damage is equal to ALL theunchainedmod:Relayed_Damage you have gained this combat.

cards.name: Stare Down
cards.description: Gain 2 temporary Dexterity. 1 theunchainedmod:Chain: Apply 1 Weak to ALL enemies.

cards.name: Stare Down+
cards.description: Gain 3 temporary Dexterity. 1 theunchainedmod:Chain: Apply 2 Weak to ALL enemies.

cards.name: Taxes
cards.description: Rightfully acquire 15 Gold from every enemy.

cards.name: Taxes+
cards.description: Rightfully acquire 20 Gold from every enemy.

cards.name: Telekinetic Pulse
cards.description: ALL enemies gain 7 Block. 2 theunchainedmod:Chain: ALL enemies lose 25 HP.

cards.name: Telekinetic Pulse+
cards.description: ALL enemies gain 10 Block. 2 theunchainedmod:Chain: ALL enemies lose 31 HP.

cards.name: Tie Down
cards.description: Enemy loses 6 Strength this and next turn. Exhaust.

cards.name: Tie Down+
cards.description: Enemy loses 8 Strength this and next turn. Exhaust.

cards.name: Trade Offer
cards.description:
Enemy gains 6 Block.
Draw 1 card.

cards.name: Trade Offer+
cards.description:
Enemy gains 12 Block.
Draw 2 cards.

cards.name: Windup
cards.description:
Apply 1 Vulnerable.
1 Chain: Add a random common Attack to your hand.
It costs 0 this turn
and exhausts.

cards.name: Windup+
cards.description:
Apply 1 Vulnerable.
1 Chain: Add a random upgraded common Attack to your hand.
It costs 0 this turn
and exhausts.

cards.name: Arcane Charm
cards.description: At the start of your turn, gain 7 theunchainedmod:Relay.

cards.name: Arcane Charm+
cards.description: At the start of your turn, gain 10 theunchainedmod:Relay.

cards.name: Chain Saw
cards.description:
Delete ALL your active theunchainedmod:Chains. Increase this card's damage by 5 for every theunchainedmod:Chain deleted this combat.
Deal 15 damage.

cards.name: Chain Saw+
cards.description:
Delete ALL your active theunchainedmod:Chains. Increase this card's damage by 10 for every theunchainedmod:Chain deleted this combat.
Deal 15 damage.

cards.name: Chase Destiny
cards.description: This turn, whenever you finish a theunchainedmod:Chain, gain [E]. Exhaust.

cards.name: Chase Destiny+
cards.description: This and next turn, whenever you finish a theunchainedmod:Chain, gain [E]. Exhaust.

cards.name: Fouetté En Tournant
cards.description:
Gain 2 theunchainedmod:Momentum X times.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Fouetté En Tournant+
cards.description:
Gain 2 theunchainedmod:Momentum (X + 1) times.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Glyph Beam
cards.description: Deal 9 damage. Whenever you gain theunchainedmod:Relay this turn, the enemy takes 9 damage.

cards.name: Glyph Beam+
cards.description: Deal 12 damage. Whenever you gain theunchainedmod:Relay this turn, the enemy takes 12 damage.

cards.name: Kusarigama
cards.description: Can only be played if it finishes an Attack theunchainedmod:Chain. Deal 30 damage to ALL enemies.

cards.name: Kusarigama+
cards.description: Can only be played if it finishes an Attack theunchainedmod:Chain. Deal 36 damage to ALL enemies.

cards.name: Last Resort
cards.description:
Draw 3 cards.
Gain [E] [E]. 2 theunchainedmod:Chain: Lose ALL your [E].
Exhaust.

cards.name: Last Resort+
cards.description:
Draw 3 cards.
Gain [E] [E]. 3 theunchainedmod:Chain: Lose ALL your [E].
Exhaust.

cards.name: Law Of Inertia
cards.description: The first time you finish a theunchainedmod:Chain each turn, gain 2 Strength and Dexterity. If you did not finish a theunchainedmod:Chain by the end of turn, lose 2 Strength and Dexterity. You cannot lose more than the amount you gained.

cards.name: Law Of Inertia+
cards.description: The first time you finish a theunchainedmod:Chain each turn, gain 3 Strength and Dexterity. If you did not finish a theunchainedmod:Chain by the end of turn, lose 3 Strength and Dexterity. You cannot lose more than the amount you gained.

cards.name: Magus Form
cards.description:
Ethereal.
Whenever you play a 2-cost card, gain [E].

cards.name: Magus Form+
cards.description: Whenever you play a 2-cost card, gain [E].

cards.name: Muscle Memory
cards.description: This turn, your next 2-cost card is played twice.

cards.name: Muscle Memory+
cards.description: This turn, your next 2 2-cost cards are played twice.

cards.name: Pirouette
cards.description:
Add a Swirl into your hand.
Upgrade ALL Swirls in your hand. Exhaust.

cards.name: Pirouette+
cards.description:
Add a Swirl into your hand.
Upgrade ALL Swirls in your hand. Exhaust.

cards.name: Relentless Movements
cards.description: Finishing a theunchainedmod:Chain gives 1 theunchainedmod:Momentum.

cards.name: Relentless Movements+
cards.description: Finishing a theunchainedmod:Chain gives 2 theunchainedmod:Momentum.

cards.name: Relentless Onslaught
cards.description:
Deal 2 damage 3 times.
1 theunchainedmod:Chain: Deal 2 damage 3 times and reapply this theunchainedmod:Chain.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Relentless Onslaught+
cards.description:
Deal 3 damage 3 times.
1 theunchainedmod:Chain: Deal 3 damage 3 times and reapply this theunchainedmod:Chain.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Solar Plexus
cards.description:
Deal 5 damage.
3 theunchainedmod:Chain: theunchainedmod:Stun the same enemy.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Solar Plexus+
cards.description:
Deal 7 damage.
2 theunchainedmod:Chain: theunchainedmod:Stun the same enemy.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Suffocate
cards.description:
Gain Block equal to the enemies Block.
Enemy loses HP equal to their Block.

cards.name: Suffocate+
cards.description:
Gain Block equal to the enemies Block.
Enemy loses HP equal to their Block.

cards.name: Tethered Mind
cards.description:
Gain 10 theunchainedmod:Relay.
Whenever you take damage or damage is blocked by theunchainedmod:Relay, the enemy loses the same amount of HP.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Tethered Mind+
cards.description:
Gain 14 theunchainedmod:Relay.
Whenever you take damage or damage is blocked by theunchainedmod:Relay, the enemy loses the same amount of HP.
Exhaust.

cards.name: The Prince's Grace
cards.description: At the start of turn, draw 2 additional cards. All enemies gain 8 Block every turn.

cards.name: The Prince's Grace+
cards.description:
Innate.
At the start of turn, draw 2 additional cards. All enemies gain 8 Block every turn.

cards.name: Thread Of Ariadne
cards.description:
If you have an active Chain, take an extra turn after this turn. End your turn.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Thread Of Ariadne+
cards.description:
If you have an active Chain, take an extra turn after this turn. End your turn.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Unshackling
cards.description: Whenever you play a card, Upgrade it for the rest of combat.

cards.name: Unshackling+
cards.description:
Innate.
Whenever you play a card, Upgrade it for the rest of combat.

relics.name: Rusted Chains
relics.description: The seventh card you play each combat costs zero.
relics.flavorText: These used to hold you to a prison wall. Now they are handy tools.

relics.name: Broken Charm
relics.description: At the start of your first 3 turns, gain 5 Relay.
relics.flavorText: Ringing it doesnt make the most pleasant of sounds, but it has emotional value.

relics.name: Wrench
relics.description: Whenever you apply Crushed Armor, the enemy loses 5 HP.
relics.flavorText: You can never fasten your armor tight enough.

relics.name: Ballet Shoes
relics.description: If you end your turn with Momentum, gain enough Momentum for the next Swirl.
relics.flavorText: Impossible to strike a bad pose with these.

relics.name: Heart of the Underdog
relics.description: At the end of turn, gain 1 Strength if you do not have more block than ALL enemies combined.
relics.flavorText: You feel it beat stronger whenever the odds are stacked against you.

relics.name: Totem Of Pain
relics.description: At the end of your turn, hit a random enemy for ALL Relayed Damage you gained since last turn.
relics.flavorText: When you listen close, you can hear the demon whisper: 'Sharing is caring'.

relics.name: Carabiner
relics.description: Chains no longer wear off at the end of turn.
relics.flavorText: There is no better tool for connecting chains.

relics.name: Churros
relics.description: The first Chain you start each turn, is copied.
relics.flavorText: These tasty treats fill you with a burst of energy.

relics.name: Memento
relics.description: The first time the block of an enemy is broken each turn, gain [E] .
relics.flavorText: The demon awakens when the tide of battle turns.

relics.name: Polished Chains
relics.description: Replaces Rusted Chains. EVERY seventh card you play each combat costs zero.
relics.flavorText: You can see your own reflection in these.

relics.name: Dancing Ribbons
relics.description: At the end of your turn add a Swirl into your hand, if you played a Swirl this turn.
relics.flavorText: It reminds you of merry times spent dancing in the tavern hall

potions.name: Chain Grease
potions.description: Gain 7 Block. Remove ALL Relayed Damage. Finish ALL your active Chains.

potions.name: Crushing Elixir
potions.description: Apply 10 Crushed Armor to ALL enemies.

keywords.name: Chain
keywords.description: Playing enough cards with the same type as this card will finish the Chain and unlock the specified effect. Chains wear off at the end of turn.

keywords.name: Crushed Armor
keywords.description: Enemies lose HP everytime they gain Block.

keywords.name: Damage Modifiers
keywords.description: All effects that influence Attack Damage.

keywords.name: Full Spin
keywords.description: Doubles the damage and Block of Swirls this turn.

keywords.name: Momentum
keywords.description: When you obtain 3 Momentum, add a Swirl into your hand.

keywords.name: Relay
keywords.description:
Until next turn, prevents damage after Block.
Half of the damage prevented by Relay is dealt to the Player in 2 turns as Relayed Damage. Relayed Damage cannot be blocked by Relay.

keywords.name: Relayed Damage
keywords.description: Damage that was prevented by Relay. Half of it is dealt to the Player at the end of the next turn. Is not blocked by Relay.
